thread.title: Taj Gibson hit one of the most incredible 60-footers you’ll ever see
thread.title_full: Taj Gibson hit one of the most incredible 60-footers you’ll ever see

author: Molly Podlesny
title: Taj Gibson hit one of the most incredible 60-footers you’ll ever see
text:
How did he make it look so easy?
Taj Gibson just heaved this incredible 62-foot buzzer-beater to tie the Thunder up with the Trailblazers at the half.
Literally he just launched it with his right arm and there, it falls nicely into the hoop.
Here it is again, from another angle.
THAT ARC IS ABSURD.
The best part is Pat Connaughton standing there under the net, watching helplessly as the ball makes its way through the hoop to the floor, following it with his head.
It’s been a big week for full-court plays. Northwestern’s full court pass and buzzer beater is something we’ll remember for a long time.
